name: TerraformDisplay
description: Wrapper around `terraform show <plan-file>` command that backs up Build summary UI
author: Alex Goncharov

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Configuration Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Terraform configuration directory. If empty, the root of the repository (build) or artifacts (release) is used, which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: secureVarsFile
inputs.label: Secured Variables File (Secrets)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick a secure file from Azure DevOps Secure Files. This option is used to pass terraform variables using a tfvars or .env file stored in secure files.

inputs.name: inputTargetPlanOrStateFilePath
inputs.label: Target Plan File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: path to a terraform plan or state file to show its content.
